file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  title: Customer Hierarchy Service
  description: >
    This is a generated connector for [SAP Intelligent Trade Claims Management API v1.0.0](https://help.sap.com/viewer/902b9d277dfe48fea582d28849d54935/CURRENT/en-US) OpenAPI specification. 
    
    In SAP Intelligent Trade Claims Management, users can group and organize their customers and nodes and assign them to a customer hierarchy.
  x-ballerina-init-description: >
    The connector initialization requires setting the API credentials.

    Create and configure an OAuth2 client credentials by following [this guide](https://help.sap.com/viewer/b865ed651e414196b39f8922db2122c7/LATEST/en-US/7aefa21a65f94b25b7e639c3931b6f83.html).
  x-ballerina-display:
    label: SAPS4HANA ITCM Customer Hierarchy
    iconPath: "icon.png"
  license:
    name: SAP
  version: 1.0.0
externalDocs:
  description: Business Documentation for Customer Hierarchy Service
  url: https://help.sap.com/viewer/902b9d277dfe48fea582d28849d54935/CURRENT/en-US/2d67d668cbca4cdfbd6ede19ad6d60e6.html
servers:
- url: https://{host}.{environment}.{domain}/v1
  variables:
    host:
      default: api.dev1
      description: Your host where SAP Intelligent Trade Claims Management has deployed
    environment:
      default: e2e
      description: Your defined environment for your SAP Intelligent Trade Claims Management account
    domain:
      default: eurekacloud.io
security:
- OAuth2: []
tags:
- name: Customer Hierarchy
paths:
  /hierarchy/customers:
    post:
      tags:
      - Customer Hierarchy
      summary: Create a new Customer Hierarchy
      description: Using this API, user can create a Customer Hierarchy. As of now, batch creation is not supported
      operationId: createCustomerHierarchy
      requestBody:
        description: Request payload to create customer hierarchy
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/HierarchyHeaderEO'
        required: true
      responses:
        '201':
          description: Success Created.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/HierarchyCreationResponse'
        '401':
          description: Unauthorized.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ResponseUnauthorizedMessage'
        '403':
          description: Forbidden (insufficient authorization).
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ResponseForbiddenMessage'
      deprecated: false
      security:
      - OAuth2: []
  /hierarchy/customers/header/{externalId}:
    get:
      tags:
      - Customer Hierarchy
      summary: Get Customer Hierarchy Nodes with header externalId
      description: Using this API, user can get particular Customer Hierarchy using header {externalId}
      operationId: getAllNodes
      parameters:
      - name: externalId
        description: External Id
        in: path
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/HierarchyNodeHeaderResponse'
        '401':
          description: Unauthorized
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ResponseUnauthorizedMessage'
        '403':
          description: Forbidden (insufficient authorization).
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ResponseForbiddenMessage'
        '404':
          description: Not Found
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ResponseNotFoundMessage'
      deprecated: false
      security:
      - OAuth2: []
  /hierarchy/customers/{externalId}:
    get:
      tags:
      - Customer Hierarchy
      summary: Get Customer Hierarchy Nodes with externalId
      description: Using this API, user can get particular Customer Hierarchy header node using {externalId}
      operationId: getNode
      parameters:
      - name: externalId
        description: External Id
        in: path
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/HierarchyNodeResponse'
        '401':
          description: Unauthorized.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ResponseUnauthorizedMessage'
        '403':
          description: Forbidden (insufficient authorization).
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ResponseForbiddenMessage'
        '404':
          description: Not Found.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ResponseNotFoundMessage'
      deprecated: false
      security:
      - OAuth2: []
  /hierarchy/customers/{headerExternalId}:
    delete:
      tags:
      - Customer Hierarchy
      summary: Delete a Customer Hierarchy Entity with externalId
      description: Using this api, user can delete the particular Customer Hierarchy using {externalId}
      operationId: deleteCustomerHierarchy
      parameters:
      - name: headerExternalId
        description: Header external Id
        in: path
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ResponseDeleteMessage'
        '401':
          description: Unauthorized.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ResponseUnauthorizedMessage'
        '403':
          description: Forbidden (insufficient authorization).
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ResponseForbiddenMessage'
        '404':
          description: Not Found.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ResponseNotFoundMessage'
      deprecated: false
      security:
      - OAuth2: []
components:
  schemas:
    Action:
      title: Action
      type: object
      properties:
        actionPermissionItems:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/ActionPermissionItem'
        enabled:
          type: boolean
        exposed:
          type: boolean
        implCommandCode:
          type: integer
        inputParameters:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/InputParameter'
        name:
          type: string
        outputParameter:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/OutputParameter'
        permission:
          type: string
        requireFullOn:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
        requireReadOn:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
        requiredPermission:
          type: string
        sideEffecting:
          type: boolean
        statical:
          type: boolean
    ActionPermissionItem:
      title: Action Permission Item
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          type: string
        permissionId:
          type: string
        value:
          type: string
    Association:
      title: Association
      type: object
      properties:
        allowCustomizeDefaultValue:
          type: boolean
        allowCustomizeLabel:
          type: boolean
        allowCustomizeValidValues:
          type: boolean
        column:
          type: string
        defaultValue:
          type: string
        description:
          type: string
        descriptionChanged:
          type: boolean
        exposed:
          type: boolean
        fullName:
          type: string
        hasCustomerPersonalData:
          type: boolean
        implTargetTable:
          type: string
        label:
          type: string
        labelChanged:
          type: boolean
        mandatory:
          type: boolean
        multiplicity:
          type: string
        name:
          type: string
        namespace:
          type: string
        rawLabel:
          type: string
        readonly:
          type: boolean
        targetBOName:
          type: string
        targetBONamespace:
          type: string
        targetPropertyName:
          type: string
        updatable:
          type: boolean
        userDefined:
          type: boolean
    BusinessObject:
      title: Business Object
      type: object
      properties:
        bo:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/BusinessObject'
        businessKey:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/BusinessObjectIdentifier'
        businessKeyValue:
          type: object
          properties: {}
        businessObjectType:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/BusinessObjectType'
        changedAssociations:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Association'
        changedProperties:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Property'
        id:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        identifier:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/BusinessObjectIdentifier'
        nodeType:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/NodeType'
        parent:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/BusinessObjectNode'
        typeCode:
          type: string
    BusinessObjectIdentifier:
      title: Business Object Identifier
      type: object
      properties:
        boName:
          type: string
        boNamespace:
          type: string
        boNodeTypeName:
          type: string
        keyValues:
          type: object
          properties: {}
        valid:
          type: boolean
    BusinessObjectNode:
      title: Business Object Node
      type: object
      properties:
        bo:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/BusinessObject'
        businessKey:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/BusinessObjectIdentifier'
        changedAssociations:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Association'
        changedProperties:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Property'
        id:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        identifier:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/BusinessObjectIdentifier'
        nodeType:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/NodeType'
        parent:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/BusinessObjectNode'
    BusinessObjectType:
      title: Business Object Type
      type: object
      properties:
        actions:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Action'
        analysable:
          type: boolean
        boSetName:
          type: string
        complexTypes:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/ComplexType'
        creatable:
          type: boolean
        customizable:
          type: boolean
        deletable:
          type: boolean
        enumerations:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/EnumType'
        exposed:
          type: boolean
        fullName:
          type: string
        label:
          type: string
        lastModified:
          type: string
        metadataRepository:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/MetadataRepository'
        name:
          type: string
        namespace:
          type: string
        nodeTypes:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Iterable-NodeType-'
        onBOChanges:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/OnBOChange'
        pluralLabel:
          type: string
        rawLabel:
          type: string
        rawPluralLabel:
          type: string
        readable:
          type: boolean
        rootNode:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/NodeType'
        updatable:
          type: boolean
        userDefined:
          type: boolean
    BusinessServiceType:
      title: Business Service Type
      type: object
      properties:
        actions:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Action'
        fullyQualifiedName:
          type: string
        namespace:
          type: string
        serviceName:
          type: string
        userDefined:
          type: boolean
    ComplexType:
      title: Complex Type
      type: object
      properties:
        elements:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Element'
        name:
          type: string
    Element:
      title: Element
      type: object
      properties:
        name:
          type: string
        type:
          type: string
    EnumType:
      title: Enum Type
      type: object
      properties:
        exposed:
          type: boolean
        members:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Member'
        name:
          type: string
    ResponseForbiddenMessage:
      type: object
      example:
        message: Access denied
        timestamp: '2021-01-18T18:33:18.914Z'
      properties:
        message:
          type: string
        timestamp:
          type: string
          format: date-time
        uri:
          type: string
      title: Forbidden Message
    ResponseNotFoundMessage:
      type: object
      example:
        message: There is no data found based on the given inputs.
        error: No Result Found
        timestamp: '2021-01-18T19:37:13.701+00:00'
      properties:
        message:
          type: string
        error:
          type: string
        timestamp:
          type: string
          format: date-time
      title: Not Found Message
    ResponseUnauthorizedMessage:
      type: object
      example:
        message: Unauthorized/API key not found
        timestamp: '2021-01-18T18:33:18.914Z'
      properties:
        message:
          type: string
        timestamp:
          type: string
          format: date-time
        uri:
          type: string
      title: Unauthorized Message
    ResponseDeleteMessage:
      title: Response Delete
      type: object
      example:
        message: Success Deleted
        timestamp: '2021-01-18T18:32:30.095Z'
      properties:
        message:
          type: string
        timestamp:
          type: string
          format: date-time
    HierarchyCreationResponse:
      title: Hierarchy Creation Response
      type: object
      example:
        message: Created Successfully
        timestamp: '2021-01-18T22:50:10.806+00:00'
        externalId: '620003'
      properties:
        hierarchyHeader:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/HierarchyHeader'
        message:
          type: string
        timestamp:
          type: string
          format: date-time
    HierarchyHeader:
      title: Hierarchy Header
      type: object
      properties:
        CreatorCode:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        Instance:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        InternalCreationTime:
          type: string
          format: date-time
        InternalUpdateTime:
          type: string
          format: date-time
        UpdatorCode:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        Version:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        bo:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/BusinessObject'
        businessCodeForMsgReport:
          type: string
        businessKey:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/BusinessObjectIdentifier'
        businessKeyValue:
          type: object
          properties: {}
        businessObjectType:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/BusinessObjectType'
        businessSystem:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        externalId:
          type: string
        hierarchyHeaderDescriptions:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/HierarchyHeaderDescription'
        hierarchyNodes:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/HierarchyNode'
        hierarchyType:
          type: string
        identifier:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/BusinessObjectIdentifier'
        internalId:
          type: string
        isDeleted:
          type: boolean
        parent:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/BusinessObjectNode'
        typeCode:
          type: string
    HierarchyHeaderDescription:
      title: Hierarchy Header Description
      type: object
      properties:
        CreatorCode:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        Instance:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        InternalCreationTime:
          type: string
          format: date-time
        InternalUpdateTime:
          type: string
          format: date-time
        UpdatorCode:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        Version:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        bo:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/BusinessObject'
        businessCodeForMsgReport:
          type: string
        businessKey:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/BusinessObjectIdentifier'
        businessKeyValue:
          type: object
          properties: {}
        businessObjectType:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/BusinessObjectType'
        description:
          type: string
        hierarchyHeader:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/HierarchyHeader'
        id:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        identifier:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/BusinessObjectIdentifier'
        internalId:
          type: string
        languageKey:
          type: string
        parent:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/BusinessObjectNode'
        typeCode:
          type: string
    HierarchyHeaderDescriptionEO:
      title: Hierarchy Header DescriptionEO
      type: object
      properties:
        description:
          type: string
        languageKey:
          type: string
    HierarchyHeaderEO:
      title: Hierarchy HeaderEO
      type: object
      example:
        businessSystem: 0
        externalId: '620003'
        hierarchyHeaderDescriptions:
        - description: Colgate Inc
          languageKey: EN
        hierarchyNodes:
        - externalId: '620004'
          externalNodeIdPath: string
          externalParentId: ''
          hierarchyNodeAssignments:
          - assignmentType: C1
            objectId: '620004'
          hierarchyNodeDescriptions:
          - description: Customer description for externalId 620003
            languageKey: EN
          internalNodeIdPath: '620003.620004'
          leafNode: true
          nodeLevel: 1
        - externalId: '620005'
          externalNodeIdPath: string
          externalParentId: '620004'
          hierarchyNodeAssignments:
          - assignmentType: C1
            objectId: '620005'
          hierarchyNodeDescriptions:
          - description: Customer description for externalId 620005
            languageKey: EN
          internalNodeIdPath: '620003.620005'
          leafNode: true
          nodeLevel: 1
        hierarchyType: C1
        isDeleted: true
      properties:
        businessSystem:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        externalId:
          type: string
        hierarchyHeaderDescriptions:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/HierarchyHeaderDescriptionEO'
        hierarchyNodes:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/HierarchyNodeEO'
        hierarchyType:
          type: string
        isDeleted:
          type: boolean
    HierarchyNode:
      title: Hierarchy Node
      type: object
      properties:
        CreatorCode:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        Instance:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        InternalCreationTime:
          type: string
          format: date-time
        InternalUpdateTime:
          type: string
          format: date-time
        UpdatorCode:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        Version:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        bo:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/BusinessObject'
        businessCodeForMsgReport:
          type: string
        businessKey:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/BusinessObjectIdentifier'
        businessKeyValue:
          type: object
          properties: {}
        businessObjectType:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/BusinessObjectType'
        externalId:
          type: string
        externalIdNodePath:
          type: string
        externalParentId:
          type: string
        hierarchyHeader:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/HierarchyHeader'
        hierarchyId:
          type: string
        hierarchyNodeAssignments:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/HierarchyNodeAssignment'
        hierarchyNodeDescriptions:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/HierarchyNodeDescription'
        id:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        identifier:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/BusinessObjectIdentifier'
        internalNodeId:
          type: string
        leafNode:
          type: boolean
        nodeLevel:
          type: integer
          format: int32
        nodePath:
          type: string
        parent:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/BusinessObjectNode'
        parentId:
          type: string
        typeCode:
          type: string
    HierarchyNodeAssignment:
      title: Hierarchy Node Assignment
      type: object
      properties:
        CreatorCode:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        Instance:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        InternalCreationTime:
          type: string
          format: date-time
        InternalUpdateTime:
          type: string
          format: date-time
        UpdatorCode:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        Version:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        assignmentType:
          type: string
        bo:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/BusinessObject'
        businessCodeForMsgReport:
          type: string
        businessKey:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/BusinessObjectIdentifier'
        businessKeyValue:
          type: object
          properties: {}
        businessObjectType:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/BusinessObjectType'
        hierarchyNode:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/HierarchyNode'
        identifier:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/BusinessObjectIdentifier'
        internalId:
          type: string
        objectId:
          type: string
        parent:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/BusinessObjectNode'
        typeCode:
          type: string
    HierarchyNodeAssignmentDTO:
      title: Hierarchy Node AssignmentDTO
      type: object
      properties:
        assignmentType:
          maxLength: 4
          minLength: 0
          pattern: '[a-zA-Z0-9/ ]*'
          type: string
        objectId:
          maxLength: 40
          minLength: 0
          type: string
    HierarchyNodeAssignmentEO:
      title: Hierarchy Node AssignmentEO
      type: object
      properties:
        assignmentType:
          type: string
        objectId:
          type: string
    HierarchyNodeDTO:
      title: Hierarchy NodeDTO
      type: object
      properties:
        externalId:
          maxLength: 40
          minLength: 0
          type: string
        externalParentId:
          maxLength: 40
          minLength: 0
          type: string
        hierarchyNodeAssignments:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/HierarchyNodeAssignmentDTO'
        hierarchyNodeDescriptions:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/HierarchyNodeDescriptionDTO'
        nodeLevel:
          type: integer
          format: int32
    HierarchyNodeDescription:
      title: Hierarchy Node Description
      type: object
      properties:
        CreatorCode:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        Instance:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        InternalCreationTime:
          type: string
          format: date-time
        InternalUpdateTime:
          type: string
          format: date-time
        UpdatorCode:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        Version:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        bo:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/BusinessObject'
        businessCodeForMsgReport:
          type: string
        businessKey:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/BusinessObjectIdentifier'
        businessKeyValue:
          type: object
          properties: {}
        businessObjectType:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/BusinessObjectType'
        description:
          type: string
        hierarchyNode:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/HierarchyNode'
        identifier:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/BusinessObjectIdentifier'
        internalId:
          type: string
        languageKey:
          type: string
        parent:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/BusinessObjectNode'
        typeCode:
          type: string
    HierarchyNodeDescriptionDTO:
      title: Hierarchy Node DescriptionDTO
      type: object
      properties:
        description:
          maxLength: 40
          minLength: 0
          pattern: '[a-zA-Z0-9/.+!@#$%^&*()+\- ]*'
          type: string
        languageKey:
          maxLength: 2
          minLength: 2
          pattern: '[a-zA-Z0-9/ ]*'
          type: string
    HierarchyNodeDescriptionEO:
      title: Hierarchy Node DescriptionEO
      type: object
      properties:
        description:
          type: string
        languageKey:
          type: string
    HierarchyNodeEO:
      title: Hierarchy NodeEO
      type: object
      properties:
        externalId:
          type: string
        externalNodeIdPath:
          type: string
        externalParentId:
          type: string
        hierarchyNodeAssignments:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/HierarchyNodeAssignmentEO'
        hierarchyNodeDescriptions:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/HierarchyNodeDescriptionEO'
        internalNodeIdPath:
          type: string
        leafNode:
          type: boolean
        nodeLevel:
          type: integer
          format: int32
    HierarchyNodeResponse:
      title: Hierarchy Node Response
      type: object
      example:
        message: Fetched Customer Hierarchy Nodes Successfully with externalId
        timestamp: '2021-01-18T22:50:28.675+00:00'
        hierarchyNodeData:
        - externalId: '620004'
          nodeLevel: 1
          externalParentId: null
          hierarchyNodeDescriptions:
          - languageKey: EN
            description: Customer description for externalId 620003
          hierarchyNodeAssignments:
          - objectId: '620004'
            assignmentType: C1
      properties:
        hierarchyNodeData:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/HierarchyNodeDTO'
        message:
          type: string
        timestamp:
          type: string
          format: date-time
    HierarchyNodeHeaderResponse:
      title: Hierarchy Node Response
      type: object
      example:
        message: Fetched Customer Hierarchy Nodes Successfully with headerExternalId
        timestamp: '2021-01-19T03:53:29.573+00:00'
        hierarchyNodeData:
        - externalId: '620004'
          nodeLevel: 1
          externalParentId: null
          hierarchyNodeDescriptions:
          - languageKey: EN
            description: Customer description for externalId 620003
          hierarchyNodeAssignments:
          - objectId: '620004'
            assignmentType: C1
        - externalId: '620005'
          nodeLevel: 2
          externalParentId: '620004'
          hierarchyNodeDescriptions:
          - languageKey: EN
